00023 #include <l4/re/mem_alloc>
00024 #include <l4/re/mem_alloc-sys.h>
00025 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00026 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00027 #include <l4/re/error_helper>
00028 
00029 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_helper>
00030 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_stream>
00031 #include <l4/sys/factory>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace L4Re
00035 {
00036 
00037 long
00038 Mem_alloc::alloc(unsigned long size,
00039                  L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, unsigned long flags) const throw()
00040 {
00041   L4::Cap<L4::Factory> f(cap());
00042   return l4_error(f->create(mem, L4Re::Dataspace::Protocol)
00043                   << l4_umword_t(size)
00044                   << l4_umword_t(flags));
00045 }
00046 
00047 long
00048 Mem_alloc::free(L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem) const throw()
00049 {
00050   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00051   io << L4::Opcode(Mem_alloc_::Free) << mem;
00052   return l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Mem_alloc));
00053 }
00054 
00055 };
